Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1950...
Had first career hit on 6/20/1954, off John Lavalle (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/13/1955, off Thomas Casey (PG)...
Released by Boston (FBA) on 10/7/1956...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/2/1958 to a 2-year deal worth $6,250,000 per year...
Injured on 6/12/1958 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/7/1963 to a 2-year deal worth $315,000 per year...
Injured on 8/11/1965 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drafted in 3rd round, 63rd overall pick, by Toledo in 1967...
Injured on 5/29/1969 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/31/1969 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/29/1970 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/25/1971, off Trevor Cahill (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/23/1972, off Sebastian Bardwell (CBC)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Columbus on 10/3/1972...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1972, hitting .333 with 1 HR, 73 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Diablo on 5/4/1975...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Wisconsin on 9/24/1975...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 10/4/1975...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Plum Grove on 4/15/1977...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New Jersey on 5/19/1979...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/11/1979...
Had 27-game hitting streak snapped on 10/1/1979...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/27/1981 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/5/1982, off Steven Clark (CBC)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1984...
